"THE CROW: SALVATION" -- by Chip Johannessen 
  The Crow : SALVATION By Chip Johannessen                OVER BLACKNESS.  Silence. Broken by the faint clink of precision tools. Accurately, patiently wielded.                INT. MYSTERY ROOM - DIMNESS  X-CLOSE. A SCALPEL returned to its place in a neat array of TAXIDERMY TOOLS. Long s
